import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Layout from '../../../pages/admin_layout' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Categories = ({ categories, data }) => { const { id } = useParams(); const [ amount, setAmount ] = useState([]); const a = []; const getAmountProduct = (id) => { const singleProduct = data.filter(element => element.cateId === id); a = {...singleProduct} console.log(a); } const section = <> {categories.map((category, index) => )}
Id Name Amount Delete/Edit
{category.id} {category.name} {getAmountProduct(category.id)}
return ( <> ) } export default Categories
